title: Moses Pleads for the Israelites
description:
Readings from:
Exodus 32:11-16, 19-20
Today's passages were read by Marc Therrian, director of workcampNE, a New England based missions organization that mobilizes teens to serve the community through free home repairs.
One Minute With the Bible is brought to you by the Christian Standard Bible. New episodes published every weekday.
